references.paper_title: Unpaired Image-to-Image Translation using Cycle-Consistent Adversarial Networks
references.reason: This paper introduces CycleGAN, a fundamental method for unpaired image-to-image translation, which is the foundation of many image translation methods.

references.paper_title: Contrastive learning for unpaired image-to-image translation
references.reason: CUT introduces a contrastive learning approach for unpaired image translation, improving upon the performance of CycleGAN and providing a key reference for subsequent work.

references.paper_title: High-resolution image synthesis with latent diffusion models
references.reason: This paper introduces Stable Diffusion, a foundational diffusion model for high-resolution image synthesis, which is the core methodology of the current work.
This paper provides the theoretical foundation for denoising diffusion probabilistic models, a crucial technique for image generation used in the target paper.

references.paper_title: An Image is Worth One Word: Personalizing Text-to-Image Generation using Textual Inversion
references.reason: This paper introduces textual inversion, a technique allowing for personalization in text-to-image generation and fine-tuning, which the authors adapt for domain knowledge injection.
